subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Marquette, relying heavily on junior college transfers, has reached the Round of 16 in the N.C.A.A. tournament while some blue-chip programs have been sent packing.
snippet: Marquette, relying heavily on junior college transfers, has reached the Round of 16 in the N.C.A.A. tournament while some blue-chip programs have been sent packing.
